description.en: Son of Rameśa Makhin, Madhura, a physician adept in the incatations of Grāvābhilāpaka, Paripūrṇabodha, the preceptor of Śrī Śārada Maṭha attained the beatitude on the night of bright fortnight of the month Kartika in the year Raudri.

shlokas:
putrO ramEzamakhinO madhurO'gadaGkRd
grAvAbhilApaka iti prathitazca mantrE.
zrIzAradAmaThaguruH paripUrNabOdhO
raudryUrjazuklanavamIm anu siddhim Arcchat..47..
